episodes.title: From Cult to Community: Redefining Identity and Belonging w/ Daniella Young
episodes.description:
From Cult Childhood to Creative Healing: Daniela Young’s Journey and Insights

In this engaging video, host Fresh King Benjamin converses with Daniela Young, a former Children of God cult member and author of ’Uncultured’, delving into her unique upbringing and the challenging journey towards integrating into society after escaping the cult. They explore the dynamics of cult life, including coercive control and the impact on personal development, relationships, and planning for the future. Daniela shares her path of self-discovery, emphasizing the role of creative expression in overcoming her past and building a new identity. Touching on broader definitions of cult experiences and the complexities of redefining purpose outside of such environments, the conversation also incorporates humor and highlights the importance of self-care, community building, and living authentically. Daniela’s exceptional ’apocalypse skill’ is revealed, adding a quirky twist to the discussion. The video concludes by encouraging engagement with Daniela’s ongoing projects and social media initiatives.
